snippet.title: Photon Engineer - Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2305110?utm_source=yt
Itch.io: https://deervision.itch.io/photon-engineer

This is the old trailer. Discover the new trailer (May 2023): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ADOYXmTux5g

Explore mysterious platforms that have suddenly appeared near Jupiter in this sci-fi game. Manipulate lasers and the environment to progress through a variety of evolving challenges. How far will you go to uncover the secrets that await you?

#puzzlegame #puzzlegames #photonengineer #indiegame
